title: Les Entreprises Prebbel
author: ''
date: '2022-10-25'
slug: les_entreprises_prebbel
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $974.9K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Les Entreprises Prebbel. The average
  contract duration was 4.02 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $524.6K. The longest
  contract was 6.42 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.1M.
lookup_name: 'LES ENTREPRISES PREBBEL'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '974.9K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '12'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '11'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '92%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '253%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.45'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '4.4M'
s424_mean_duration: '4.02'
s421_mean_contract_value: '524.6K'
s425_max_duration: '6.42'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.1M'
---
